sqlMap.select: SELECT CASE WHEN C.COL_SEQ IS NOT NULL THEN '' ELSE 'I' END AS STATUS, A.INF_ID, A.INF_SEQ, B.COL_SEQ, B.COL_ID, B.COL_NM, C.SERIES_CD, C.YAXIS_POS, C.XAXIS_YN, C.SORT_TAG, CASE C.V_ORDER WHEN 0 THEN B.COL_SEQ WHEN NULL THEN B.COL_SEQ ELSE C.V_ORDER END AS V_ORDER, NVL(C.VIEW_YN,'N') AS VIEW_YN, NVL(C.USE_YN,'Y') AS USE_YN, B.UNIT_CD FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE A.INF_ID= #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD =#srvCd:VARCHAR# AND A.DS_USE_YN ='Y' ORDER BY B.V_ORDER
sqlMap.update: MERGE INTO TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL A USING( SELECT #infId:VARCHAR# AS INF_ID ,#infSeq:NUMERIC# AS INF_SEQ ,#colSeq:NUMERIC# AS COL_SEQ ,#seriesCd:VARCHAR# AS SERIES_CD ,#yaxisPos:CHAR# AS YAXIS_POS ,#xaxisYn:CHAR# AS XAXIS_YN ,#sortTag:CHAR# AS SORT_TAG ,#viewYn:CHAR# AS VIEW_YN ,#useYn:CHAR# AS USE_YN ,#sessionUsrId:VARCHAR# AS REG_ID ,SYSDATE AS REG_DTTM ,#sessionUsrId:VARCHAR# AS UPD_ID ,SYSDATE AS UPD_DTTM ,#vOrder:NUMERIC# AS V_ORDER FROM DUAL )B ON ( A.INF_ID = B.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = B.INF_SEQ AND A.COL_SEQ =B.COL_SEQ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.SERIES_CD = B.SERIES_CD ,A.YAXIS_POS = B.YAXIS_POS ,A.XAXIS_YN = B.XAXIS_YN ,A.SORT_TAG = B.SORT_TAG ,A.VIEW_YN = B.VIEW_YN ,A.USE_YN = B.USE_YN ,A.UPD_ID = B.UPD_ID ,A.UPD_DTTM = B.UPD_DTTM ,A.V_ORDER = B.V_ORDER WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.INF_ID ,A.INF_SEQ ,A.COL_SEQ ,A.SERIES_CD ,A.YAXIS_POS ,A.XAXIS_YN ,A.SORT_TAG ,A.VIEW_YN ,A.USE_YN ,A.REG_ID ,A.REG_DTTM ,A.UPD_ID ,A.UPD_DTTM ,A.V_ORDER )VALUES ( B.INF_ID ,B.INF_SEQ ,B.COL_SEQ ,B.SERIES_CD ,B.YAXIS_POS ,B.XAXIS_YN ,B.SORT_TAG ,B.VIEW_YN ,B.USE_YN ,B.REG_ID ,B.REG_DTTM ,B.UPD_ID ,B.UPD_DTTM ,B.V_ORDER )
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.INF_ID ,A.INF_SEQ ,A.INF_NM ,A.SRV_CD ,A.OWNER_CD ,A.DS_ID ,A.DS_NM ,B.COL_ID ,B.SRC_COL_ID ,B.COL_NM ,B.COL_SEQ ,COND_YN ,COND_OP ,COND_VAR ,FILT_YN ,FILT_CD ,FILT_MAX_DAY ,FILT_TBL_CD ,FILT_CODE ,FILT_DEFAULT ,CASE FILT_CD WHEN 'CHECK' THEN FILT_DEFAULT WHEN 'COMBO' THEN FILT_DEFAULT WHEN 'RADIO' THEN FILT_DEFAULT ELSE '' END FILT_DEFAULT1 ,CASE FILT_CD WHEN 'POPUP' THEN FILT_DEFAULT ELSE '' END FILT_DEFAULT2 ,FILT_NEED ,CASE FILT_CD WHEN 'CHECK' THEN FILT_NEED WHEN 'COMBO' THEN FILT_NEED WHEN 'RADIO' THEN FILT_NEED ELSE 'N' END FILT_NEED1 ,CASE FILT_CD WHEN 'POPUP' THEN FILT_NEED ELSE 'N' END FILT_NEED2 FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE C.INF_ID=#infId:VARCHAR# AND C.INF_SEQ=#infSeq:NUMERIC# AND C.COL_SEQ=#colSeq:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL SET COND_YN = #condYn:VARCHAR# ,COND_OP = #condOp:VARCHAR# ,COND_VAR = #condVar:VARCHAR# ,FILT_YN = #filtYn:VARCHAR# ,FILT_CD = #filtCd:VARCHAR# ,FILT_MAX_DAY = NVL(#filtMaxDay:NUMERIC#,1) ,FILT_TBL_CD = #filtTblCd:VARCHAR# ,FILT_CODE = #filtCode:VARCHAR# ,FILT_DEFAULT = #filtDefault:VARCHAR# ,FILT_DEFAULT_NM = #filtDefaultNm:VARCHAR# ,FILT_NEED = NVL(#filtNeed:VARCHAR#,'N') ,UPD_ID = #sessionUsrId:VARCHAR# ,UPD_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE INF_ID=#infId# AND INF_SEQ=#infSeq:NUMERIC# AND COL_SEQ=#colSeq:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.select: SELECT B.SRC_COL_ID ,C.COND_OP ,C.COND_VAR FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y' INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE C.INF_ID=#infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD = 'C' AND C.COND_YN = 'Y' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DS_USE_YN ='Y' ORDER BY C.V_ORDER

SELECT B.SRC_COL_ID ,C.SORT_TAG FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y' INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE C.INF_ID=#infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD = 'C' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.SORT_TAG IS NOT NULL AND A.DS_USE_YN ='Y' ORDER BY C.V_ORDER

SELECT
B.COL_NM
B.ENG_COL_NM AS COL_NM
,B.SRC_COL_ID ,C.SORT_TAG FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE A.INF_ID=#infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD=#srvCd:VARCHAR# AND C.USE_YN='Y' AND C.VIEW_YN='Y' ORDER BY C.V_ORDER

SELECT * FROM( SELECT
B.COL_NM
B.ENG_COL_NM AS COL_NM
,B.SRC_COL_ID ,C.FILT_YN ,C.FILT_CD ,C.FILT_MAX_DAY ,C.FILT_TBL_CD ,C.FILT_CODE ,C.FILT_NEED ,C.FILT_DEFAULT ,C.V_ORDER ,C.FILT_DEFAULT_NM FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y' INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE A.INF_ID= #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD= #srvCd:VARCHAR# AND C.USE_YN='Y' AND C.FILT_YN='Y' AND C.FILT_CD IN('CHECK','RADIO','COMBO') AND C.FILT_CODE IS NOT NULL AND A.DS_USE_YN ='Y' UNION ALL SELECT B.COL_NM ,B.SRC_COL_ID ,C.FILT_YN ,C.FILT_CD ,C.FILT_MAX_DAY ,C.FILT_TBL_CD ,C.FILT_CODE ,C.FILT_NEED ,C.FILT_DEFAULT ,C.V_ORDER ,C.FILT_DEFAULT_NM FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y' INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE A.INF_ID= #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD= #srvC:VARCHARd# AND C.USE_YN='Y' AND C.FILT_YN='Y' AND A.DS_USE_YN ='Y' AND C.FILT_CD NOT IN('CHECK','RADIO','COMBO') )ORDER BY V_ORDER

SELECT * FROM( SELECT B.SRC_COL_ID ,B.COL_NM ,D.DITC_CD
,D.DITC_NM
,D.ENG_DITC_NM AS DITC_NM
,decode(C.COND_YN, 'Y', FN_COND_VAR_LIMIT(B.SRC_COL_ID, D.DITC_CD, C.COND_OP, C.COND_VAR), 'Y') as VIEW_YN FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID AND B.USE_YN ='Y' INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ INNER JOIN TV_DATA_CODE D ON C.FILT_CODE =D.GRP_CD WHERE A.INF_ID= #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD= #srvCd:VARCHAR# AND C.USE_YN='Y' AND C.FILT_YN='Y' AND A.DS_USE_YN ='Y' AND C.FILT_CD IN('CHECK','RADIO','COMBO') ORDER BY D.V_ORDER ) WHERE VIEW_YN='Y'

SELECT A.SGRP_CD, A.LYTIT_NM, A.RYTIT_NM, A.ENG_LYTIT_NM, A.ENG_RYTIT_NM, A.SERIES_FYN , CASE WHEN A.SERIES_POSX = 'R' THEN 'right' WHEN A.SERIES_POSX = 'L' THEN 'left' ELSE 'center' END AS SERIES_POSX , CASE WHEN A.SERIES_POSY = 'T' THEN 'top' WHEN A.SERIES_POSY = 'M' THEN 'middle' ELSE 'bottom' END AS SERIES_POSY , CASE WHEN A.SERIES_ORD = 'H' THEN 'vertical' ELSE 'horizontal' END AS SERIES_ORD , FN_GET_COMM_VALUE_CD('D1016', XLN_CD) AS XLN_CD , FN_GET_COMM_VALUE_CD('D1017', YLN_CD) AS YLN_CD FROM TB_OPEN_INF_SRV A WHERE 1=1 AND A.INF_ID = #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD = 'C'

SELECT B.COL_NM, B.ENG_COL_NM AS COL_NM, B.COL_ID, B.DS_ID, A.OWNER_CD , C.SERIES_CD, C.XAXIS_YN, C.YAXIS_POS, C.SORT_TAG , FN_GET_COMM_VALUE_CD('D1020', SERIES_CD) AS VALUE_NM , FN_GET_COMM_CODE_NM('D1020', SERIES_CD) AS SERIES_NM FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.INF_ID = #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD = 'C' AND C.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.V_ORDER

SELECT B.COL_NM, FN_GET_COMM_VALUE_CD('D1020', SERIES_CD) AS VALUE_NM FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.INF_ID = #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD = 'C' AND C.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND C.XAXIS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.YAXIS_POS

SELECT B.COL_ID, B.COL_NM, C.SERIES_CD , FN_GET_COMM_VALUE_CD('D1020', SERIES_CD) AS VALUE_NM , FN_GET_COMM_CODE_NM('D1020', SERIES_CD) AS SERIES_NM FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.INF_ID = #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD = 'C' AND C.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND C.XAXIS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND C.YAXIS_POS = 'L'
ORDER BY C.V_ORDER

SELECT B.COL_ID, B.COL_NM, C.SERIES_CD , FN_GET_COMM_VALUE_CD('D1020', SERIES_CD) AS VALUE_NM , FN_GET_COMM_CODE_NM('D1020', SERIES_CD) AS SERIES_NM FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.INF_ID = #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD = 'C' AND C.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND C.XAXIS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.YAXIS_POS = 'R' ORDER BY C.V_ORDER

SELECT B.COL_NM FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.INF_ID = #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD = 'C' AND C.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND C.XAXIS_YN = 'Y' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.V_ORDER

SELECT B.COL_ID, B.DS_ID FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.INF_ID = #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD = 'C' AND C.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND C.XAXIS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND C.YAXIS_POS = 'L'
ORDER BY C.V_ORDER

SELECT B.COL_ID, B.DS_ID FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.INF_ID = #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD = 'C' AND C.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND C.XAXIS_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.YAXIS_POS = 'R' ORDER BY C.V_ORDER

SELECT B.COL_ID, B.DS_ID FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_DSCOL B ON A.DS_ID = B.DS_ID INNER JOIN TB_OPEN_INF_CCOL C ON A.INF_ID = C.INF_ID AND A.INF_SEQ = C.INF_SEQ AND B.COL_SEQ = C.COL_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.INF_ID = #infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD = 'C' AND C.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND C.XAXIS_YN = 'Y' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.V_ORDER
SELECT $xColQuery$ FROM $tableNm$ WHERE 1=1 $whereQuery$ $condQuery$ $orderByQuery$
SELECT $yColQuery$ FROM $tableNm$ WHERE 1=1 $whereQuery$ $condQuery$ $orderByQuery$
SELECT $ryColQuery$ FROM $tableNm$ WHERE 1=1 $whereQuery$ $condQuery$ $orderByQuery$

select.isNotEqual: SELECT $selectQuery$ ,WISEOPEN_CNT FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT $selectQuery$ ,COUNT(*) OVER() WISEOPEN_CNT FROM $tableNm$ WHERE 1=1 $whereQuery$ $pubDttmQuery$ $condQuery$ $orderByQuery$ )TB ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #startPage:NUMERIC# AND #endPage:NUMERIC#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS cnt FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT $selectQuery$ FROM $tableNm$ $whereQuery$ $pubDttmQuery$ $condQuery$ $orderByQuery$ )TB ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #startPage:NUMERIC# AND #endPage:NUMERIC#
select.isEqual: SELECT COUNT(1) AS cnt FROM $tableNm$ WHERE 1=1 $whereQuery$ $pubDttmQuery$ $condQuery$

sqlMap.select:
SELECT 'SELECT '|| COL_ID||' AS COL_ID,'||COL_NM||' AS COL_NM FROM ' ||TBL_ID ||' WHERE 1=1 '|| CASE WHEN TRIM(COND_WHERE) = '' THEN '' WHEN TRIM(COND_WHERE) IS NULL THEN '' ELSE 'AND '||COND_WHERE END
|| ' AND (UPPER(' || COL_ID || ') LIKE ''%'||#popupSerach#||'%'' OR UPPER( '|| COL_NM||') LIKE ''%' || #popupSerach# || '%'')'
||'ORDER BY '||COL_NM AS queryString FROM TV_POPUP_CODE WHERE TBL_ID = #tblId:CHAR#
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( $queryString$ )TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#
SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM( $queryString$ )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT OFFC_CD AS COL_ID ,OFFC_NM AS COL_NM FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC#
AND OFFC_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'
ORDER BY OFFC_NM )TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC#
AND OFFC_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize:NUMERIC# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT FGO_CD AS COL_ID ,FGO_NM AS COL_NM FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND GOF_DIV_CD = #gofDivCd:VARCHAR# AND OFFC_CD =#offcCd:VARCHAR# AND FSCL_CD =#fsclCd:VARCHAR# AND ACCT_CD =#acctCd:VARCHAR#
AND FGO_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'
ORDER BY FGO_NM )TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND GOF_DIV_CD = #gofDivCd:VARCHAR# AND OFFC_CD =#offcCd:VARCHAR# AND FSCL_CD =#fsclCd:VARCHAR# AND ACCT_CD =#acctCd:VARCHAR#
AND FGO_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize:NUMERIC# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT FSCL_CD AS COL_ID ,FSCL_NM AS COL_NM FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC#
AND FSCL_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'
ORDER BY FSCL_NM )TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC#
AND FSCL_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize:NUMERIC# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT ACCT_CD AS COL_ID ,ACCT_NM AS COL_NM FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND FSCL_CD = #fsclCd:VARCHAR#
AND ACCT_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'
ORDER BY ACCT_NM )TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND FSCL_CD = #fsclCd:VARCHAR#
AND ACCT_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize:NUMERIC# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT FLD_CD AS COL_ID ,FLD_NM AS COL_NM FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC#
AND FLD_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'
ORDER BY FLD_NM )TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC#
AND FLD_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize:NUMERIC# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT SECT_CD AS COL_ID ,SECT_NM AS COL_NM FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND FLD_CD = #fldCd:VARCHAR#
AND SECT_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'
ORDER BY SECT_NM )TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND FLD_CD = #fldCd:VARCHAR#
AND SECT_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize:VARCHAR# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT PGM_CD AS COL_ID ,PGM_NM AS COL_NM FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND FLD_CD = #fldCd:VARCHAR# AND SECT_CD =#sectCd:VARCHAR#
AND PGM_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'
ORDER BY PGM_NM )TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND FLD_CD = #fldCd:VARCHAR# AND SECT_CD =#sectCd:VARCHAR#
AND PGM_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize:NUMERIC# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT ACTV_CD AS COL_ID ,ACTV_NM AS COL_NM FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND FLD_CD = #fldCd:VARCHAR# AND SECT_CD =#sectCd:VARCHAR# AND PGM_CD = #pgmCd:VARCHAR#
AND ACTV_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'
ORDER BY ACTV_NM )TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND FLD_CD = #fldCd:VARCHAR# AND SECT_CD =#sectCd:VARCHAR# AND PGM_CD = #pgmCd:VARCHAR#
AND ACTV_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize:NUMERIC# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT IKWAN_CD AS COL_ID ,IKWAN_NM AS COL_NM FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy#
AND IKWAN_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'
ORDER BY IKWAN_NM )TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC#
AND IKWAN_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize:NUMERIC# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT IHANG_CD AS COL_ID ,IHANG_NM AS COL_NM FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND IKWAN_CD =#ikwanCd:CHAR#
AND IHANG_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'
ORDER BY IHANG_NM )TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND IKWAN_CD =#ikwanCd:VARCHAR#
AND IHANG_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT IMOK_CD AS COL_ID ,IMOK_NM AS COL_NM FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND IKWAN_CD =#ikwanCd:VARCHAR# AND IHANG_CD =#ihangCd:VARCHAR#
AND IMOK_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'
ORDER BY IMOK_NM )TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND IKWAN_CD =#ikwanCd:VARCHAR# AND IHANG_CD =#ihangCd:VARCHAR#
AND IHANG_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize:NUMERIC# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT CITM_CD AS COL_ID ,CITM_NM AS COL_NM FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC#
AND CITM_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'
ORDER BY CITM_NM )TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC#
AND CITM_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize:NUMERIC# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT EITM_CD AS COL_ID ,EITM_NM AS COL_NM FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND CITM_CD = #citmCd:VARCHAR#
AND EITM_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'
ORDER BY EITM_NM )TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC# AND CITM_CD = #citmCd:VARCHAR#
AND EITM_NM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (TRUNC(ROWNUM / #pageSize:NUMERIC# - 0.1) +1) RN, TB.* FROM ( SELECT YYYYMM AS COL_ID ,MM AS COL_NM FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC#
AND MM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'
ORDER BY YYYYMM )TB ) WHERE RN = #currPage:NUMERIC#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM $tblId$ WHERE 1=1 AND FSCL_YY = #fsclYy:NUMERIC#
AND MM LIKE '%'|| #popupSerach#||'%'
SELECT A.FS_YN ,A.FS_CD FROM TV_MNG_INF_SRV A WHERE A.INF_ID=#infId:VARCHAR# AND A.SRV_CD=#srvCd:VARCHAR#
SELECT $srcColNm$ FROM $filtTblCd$ WHERE ROWNUM = 1 AND $srcColId$ = #filtDefaultVal:VARCHAR#
